Home Connect Tribe Wallet Message Home Screen
You cannot be a Connector until one of your friends invites you What is FWD? Connection Through People You Trust, Not An Algorithm More Personalized Information Social & Supportive Let’s face it — dating online is lonely and boring.

You're `introduced` to people you'd never date and have no idea how they are connected to your life.

With FWD, you can change that by inviting your trusted humans (Tribe) to help you out. Your Tribe members introduce you to people they know in real life.

They also send you profile recommendations of people already on FWD. You learn how your prospective match is connected you and your Tribe — and what your Tribe thinks of them.

And if you don't want to build a Tribe, you don't have to. You can go solo and swipe alone. You're no longer dating alone online and talking to random people you don't know.

Chat with your Tribe about their real-life connections, your matches, about life.

And, hey, send them a coin for all their help. Who are you here for? Me My Friend(s) You're a Dater!

Swipe for yourself and chat with people you match with.

You can add friends (Connectors) to make profile recommendations and introduce you to people they know. You're a Connector!

You can send profile recommendations to your friends.

You can also introduce your friends to someone you know.

around you. Adjust your Preferences to see
more profiles. Or check
 back in soon. Hello, and greetings, from FWD!

We are happy to include you in our community

FWD is not just another app. It is people and their trusted humans working together to meet through connections, trust and common friends

While here, we ask that you treat everyone with civility and goodwill. That means treating people without prejudice and with respect

If we can help in any way, let us know. We are here for you, like a member of your Tribe! Are you sure you want to disable your Dater account? If you disable your account, you will no longer be able to access profiles (existing and future) or message FWD users (Connectors and matches). Your Dater profile and messages will not appear on FWD Are you sure you want to disable your Connector account? and your friends. We will notify you as soon as we have finished our review Select Your Date of Birth Upload More Photos Bio Remove Rematch Interested? Tribe Member Connection! If %1$s likes you too, then you'll be matched and be able to message one another FWD! Swiping a profile to the right means you like the person. They won't be notified unless they like your profile too. Swiping a profile to the right means you this person would be a good match with your FWD friend

The person in the profile will not be notified unless your FWD friend approves your profile suggestion Swiping a profile to the left means you're not interested in the person. They will not be notified and won't be shown to you again. Swiping a profile to the left means you do not think this person would match with your FWD friend

The person in the profile will not be notified and you will not be shown it again Yes, FWD Yes, I am Match! Not a Match? Not Interested? No, I’m not Not a Match No, thanks Copy This Gesture Do They Match? Copy the gesture in the photo.

Account Type One of the unique benefits of FWD is that you can have dual accounts: Connector (to help your friends) or Dater (for yourself).

Toggle this button switch between accounts. Requests Who You're Recommending For Remember to look at this bar to see who you are recommending for. It changes with the profiles you're reviewing!

XMPPConnection not initial What is FWD? Let’s face it — dating online is lonely and boring. You're "introduced" to people you'd never date and have no idea how they are connected to your life. With FWD, you can change that by inviting your trusted humans (Tribe) to help you out. Connection Through People You Trust, Not Just An Algorithm Your Tribe members introduce you to people they know in real life. They also send you profile recommendations of people already on FWD. More Personalized, Meaningful Information " You learn how your prospective match is connected you and your Tribe — and what your Tribe thinks of them. And if you don’t want to build a Tribe, you don’t have to. You can go solo and swipe alone. "Social, Supportive & Secure " You're no longer dating alone online and talking to random people you don't know. Chat with your Tribe about their real-life connections, your matches, about life. And, hey, send them a coin for all their help. Cancel FWD is for people who are 18 and older. Come back ands see us when you turn 18!
